text: Motion of the hand-arm-system without load
label: Reach

text: Change of the position of a part in relation to a reference coordinate system
label: Insert/Remove

text: Rotation of the hand-arm system along a fixed axis
label: Screw/Unscrew

text: Repositioning of the worker/robot in space
label: Relocate

text: Indicates that the gripper of a robot or the hand of human worker holds an object
label: Grasp

text: The gripper of a robot or the hand of human worker is free
label: Release

text: Pick up a tool from a tool magazine
label: Pick

text: Return of a tool into a tool magazine
label: Return

text: Robot must be calibrated at its current position or a human worker has to orientate himself at the working place
label: Calibrate

text: Mirroring of other movements in general
label: Follow

text: Hold the position within the current circumstances
label: Balance

text: Recording a path, e.g. during teaching (special case of follow)
label: Record

text: Information exchange form the senior human worker to the novice/robots
label: Teach

text: Information exchange between two or more workers/robots
label: Communicate

text: Wait while the other partner performs an action
label: Time Delay
